name: Wind Wall
description: Starting from target tile, create one or more wind torrents (at most Mag / 5) in connecting tiles. Torrents last 1 turn. Creating a torrent in a tile with a unit moves that unit to an adjacent empty tile, if possible. Flying units cannot enter torrent tiles; torrent tiles cost other units 2 movement to enter. Units can’t target other units through torrents except at 1 Range.
